com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.root
Interface FieldInformerLocator

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicFieldInformerLocator, CumulativeFieldInformerLocator, DelegatingInformerLocator, GraphDelegatingInformerLocator, GraphFieldLocator, LazyInterfaceInformerLocator, ServiceBackedFieldLocator
public interface FieldInformerLocator

Field informer locator is able to combine all existing informations about a field in order to build the most comprehensive FieldInformer

Author:
Nicolas

Method Summary
 FieldInformer getInformerFor(Class informedClass, String fieldName)
          Fallback method allowing one to check if a field exist for a given class, even if not found using getInformerFor(Property)
 FieldInformer getInformerFor(Property field)
          Given an input Property, a FieldInformer will use its own strategy to provide the most meaningfull FieldInformer
 

Method Detail

getInformerFor

FieldInformer getInformerFor(Property field)
Given an input Property, a FieldInformer will use its own strategy to provide the most meaningfull FieldInformer

Parameters:
field -
Returns:
an informer for the field, or null if none can be found

getInformerFor

FieldInformer getInformerFor(Class informedClass,
                             String fieldName)
Fallback method allowing one to check if a field exist for a given class, even if not found using getInformerFor(Property)

Parameters:
informedClass - class in which this field is looked
fieldName - searched field name
Returns:
an informer for the field, or null if none can be found
